ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: A simple thank you
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh yeah. Meldrath sucks! ... Or Centi Warhammer for those of us not allowed to use sharp objects. (Quoth the Joker from the Batman: Knightfall audiobook I
ygData.messageBody:
> I remember the Plague Rats of Steamfront from my days hunting
> Clockworks for my Trueshot. And all those elementals, Minotaurs and
> that Meldrath guy. I'm thinking it's payback time myself!
>
Oh yeah. Meldrath sucks!
>
> Revenge is a dish best served on the end of a sword!
>
Or Centi Warhammer for those of us not allowed to use sharp objects. (Quoth
the Joker from the Batman: Knightfall audiobook "I want a sharp object!")
If it makes anyone feel better, I owned Meldrath 3 times in one day to make
up for him killing me once. :-)
It is sooo good to see him die.
luv,
-Su
